name: 💥 Block Bang 💥
description:
Welcome to 💥Block Bang💥

This game is a top down shooter game where a square will shoot other squares because … why not? My game my rules :|

Note:

  • When shooting bullets, some bullets may seem that they hit the enemy but it wasn't registered. I am trying my best to fix this as much as I can
  • Sound in this game will be added very soon
  • This game is only served as a prototype, so do expect bugs or lag and if so it would help to report them to me so I can improve them :)
